title: "City of Los Angeles Grants Union Recognition to the Griffith Observatory Planetarium's Lecturers"
excerpt: "Lecturers who narrate the planetarium shows at Griffith Observatory and who took steps late last year to form a union, this week have been granted union recognition by the City of Los Angeles’ City Employee Relations Board."
